Clip.Title: REVERSE EXPLORATION
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Palobi and Mudeya come from a tribe of Papua New Guinea. They launch on an expedition in the heart of a very strange civilization: 21st Century France.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of Nova Scotia is a living historical record of the centuries-old battle between the French and the English in the New World, along one of the Atlantic's most remote, hostile coastlines.

Clip.Title: REVERSE EXPLORATION
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Palobi and Mudeya come from a tribe of Papua New Guinea. They launch on an expedition in the heart of a very strange civilization: 21st Century France.

Clip.Title: DESIGN BY DECADE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The 1970's were a transitional time in Canada, and the designs from this period reflect this diverse decade.

Clip.Title: CITY GUIDES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow our City Guide as she takes us around the posh and trendy neighbourhood of Yorkville.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Vancouver Island's Western Coastline is a collection of scenic towns, parks and coastal rainforest unique in the world - from Tofino, to Pacific Rim National Park Reserve, and Clayoquot Sound UNESCO Biosphere Reserve.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Canada's easternmost point to Europe's westernmost point, this aerial survey explores the Atlantic coastline, from the wonders of St. John's Newfoundland and the Avalon peninsula - to the unique islands of St. Pierre and Miquelon.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Tavolara to Capo Caccia, emeralds, corals, granite and cork are Sardinia's colours with its inland Nuraghi, charming coasts and beautiful blue waters.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.Episode: From Bosa to the Dunes of Piscinas
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Bosa to the dunes of Piscinas we continue our journey from Orosei Gulf down to Villasimius up to Sardinia's main centre Cagliari.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: It's the second largest, and grooviest looking planet. It's also a mini-solar system with 60 moons (most of them recently discovered) and those crazy rings. It's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighbourhood.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: With the Dawn mission's exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. We'll see what's new in big floating space rocks.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: QUEST

Clip.Title: GAME OVER
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Meet a designer, a gold farmer, specialists and players who will immerse you into a virtual world that has not only influenced mass entertainment, but has become a technological, social, cultural and economic phenomenon.
